website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced piece of furniture with an expensive look that will complement both traditional and contemporary home decor.
pros: Mirrored doors and rich espresso brown finish give this buffet table stylish appeal
Features four divided storage compartments and three drawers for storing numerous items
cons: Materials have a strong chemical odor upon arrival
Rare reports of damage, possibly caused during shipping

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Buffet
customer_reviews.text: I love this buffet. It is a really beautiful addition to our home. The color is rich. The design is contemporary. And the size is perfect, not too small or large. My husband says it was easy to put together. He also advises using a screwdriver and not an electric drill, while taking your time to put the pieces together. He says to check to make sure you have all of your parts and the condition of each part, starting with the glass doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece, small cubbies
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece, especially for the price. That being said I wish I had seen a picture with it open because unfortunately it really does not serve my purposes. I wanted to store some slightly oversized pieces in there and it's a no go. It is divided in the inside in 12" cubbies. I was thinking ( okay hoping lol) that the shelves went all the way through which they don't. Just a tiny bit more and it coulda' been a contender lol. I am keeping it though. My husband was able to put it together rather easily and it will be a nice addition to my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Whatsthe411hon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. A nice addition to my dining room, not to large or to small. The only thing for me is that I am still waiting for the smell of the stain I guess to completely go away, other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: CD Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Very snug fit of parts
customer_reviews.text: It took me several hours to put all the pieces together by myselfr, but the instructions were fairly easy to follow if you've had a little experience. I was really surprised at how tight fitting everything was. It looks nice with my expresso colored dining table. It's a small buffet, but it fit the area I needed it for. Cons: It isn't dovetailed in the drawers and there aren't slides on the drawers. I'll apply a little soap wax to the drawers and it should slide a little smoother. But a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. O. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Construction materials are EXTREMELY TOXIC.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful buffet, the design is an eye catcher; however the materials used in construction are EXTREMELY TOXIC, the odor is strong/overwhelming. I'd hate to pass it on to someone else--the toxic materials might be a health hazard. I wish I could return it for refund but it was a put-together item, original packing is trashed and the buffet is too heavy to return ship. I am very sad about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture, very sturdy and lots of cabinet/ drawer space. Only needed husband to help put the doors on other than that the directions were easy to read and put together. No missing parts. Looking to purchase the smaller one for my family room.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Granitz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Looks Nice, No Smell
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but a few small scratched areas along some of the cabinet edges. Shelves inside ARE ADJUSTABLE. We didn't notice any strong odor and had no problems with it. Given the scratches along some of the edges I don't know how durable it will be over time - especially the top if you setting things on it. For the money, its a great piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: ABL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This piece came quickly and well packaged. Nothing was missing or damaged. I put this together, alone, in about 105 minutes (I'm a not-so-strong woman in my 30's). The directions were easy to follow, the pieces were all labeled. I was very glad I had a power drill. It feels very sturdy. I was able to adjust the height of the shelves inside the unit, which was nice. I also bought the pictured runner off Amazon! 10/10 great purchase! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to install and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and looks beautiful! We are very happy with it. The color looks just like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline S.

customer_reviews.title: Kings Brand Rutheron Buffet Server Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks as beautiful as pictured in description. The three draws offer ample room for storage of almost anything you wish to put in them. Also, the doors open up to two deep shelves. You can set the shelves anyway you want because there are several holes in which to put the pegs that come with it. You then lay the shelf on top of the pegs you already put in. We are very happy with ours.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this piece. It's small and almost looks like play furniture. It looks cheap. It wasn't made well and it also smells so strong. I assume it's the finish used on the wood, but had to open all the windows for a couple days and still haven't aired it out. I'd like to return it but I've already assembled it and that was NOT easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dabney

customer_reviews.title: Gorgous
customer_reviews.text: The pictures have no justice, this is an absolute stunning piece! It is well built, nice dark cherry and plenty of room inside. The only flaw with it, is the smell! It smells like new carpet but a little more overwhelming. We have had it up a couple of days within our house but it still smells very strong. I'm hoping within the next week or so it will go away. Great buy, def. recommend. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Waited a long time for this to come back in stock. Exactly as pictured. My husband put it together. Took a while but the instructions were excellent. Even came with extra screws. So well packed too. We love everything about it. All pros, no cons. It even arrived early. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I tried to assemble this unit but could not. I found the assembly instructions vague. I then hired a professional handyman with over 20 years of experience in assembling furniture etc. The professional took close to three hours to assemble this unit. The drawers appear to be made of card boards and not wood and even the pro found them difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Looking
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when we finally put it together BUT it was difficult to put together. Priced a lot higher on different websites.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Flores Prieto

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT IS EXTREMELY  DIFFICULT TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst piece of furniture I have ever had the displeasure of putting together. It’s taken me 5 hours now by myself to put it together and now I’m stuck with the the doors because I don’t have 3 hands to hold a door straight, hold the screw and then screw it in. If you live on your own do yourself a favor and DO NOT BUY THIS CABINET. It came with 13 different bags of different screws when It clearly did not need that much. I don’t know now what to do with a cabinet with no doors when it’s entire core feature was the mirror doors.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Takes about five hours to put together . Very sturdy and well built. Nice looking . But got to say has a very strong chemical Oder! Had to wipe down with a Odor control and air out!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: You have to put it together. Takes time.
customer_reviews.text: This is for an addition to Dining room. Server/side bar to match dining table. Took a little longer than I expected to put together, but overall everything went well. Instruction on point and an extra screw was added for each type of tools sent. Came together really nice and looks great. Not sturdy, but strong.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Hinge broke after 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Originally, i wrote a 5 star review. Had this piece set up for 4 days and already one of the hinges messed up to the point the door wouldnt close. Not sure why. Looked like the screw just popped out from holding the hinge to the door. And it wouldnt screw back in. Really upset because i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this buffet cabinet is simply PERFECT!!!!! It is so pretty and there's a lot of space in the drawers and in the cabinets. I truly love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renea ohio

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to sit side by side. They are gorgeous! Very easy to assemble and the look is stunning. I only wish they were a little deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Missing and broken parts
customer_reviews.text: I like the cabinet but the six handles for the doors and drawers were not included and the mirror on one of the doors is cracked . Please just send me a the six handles and a replacement door and we can call it good. Thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match a dining set I bought from Basset at 10% of the cost of theirs. Looks so pretty and just the right size for my area.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great buy!! Great quality piece of furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect!! It arrived super quick and was kinda easy to put together...( took me 3 hours by myself) super sturdy as well!! Super happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Lou

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is amazed i got this at amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Took a little bit of time to put together, but it is so sturdy and have had no issues with it. holds so many of my kitchen tools while looking classy. Everyone who sees it is amazed i got it on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and beautiful piece it really makes the kitchen area look so much better
customer_reviews.author: Dfole1

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but a bit over priced for the value!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as ordered and was very easy to put together. Great looking piece, but a bit smaller than we imagined from the pictures. Be sure to look at the dimensions before you order it! Other than that it's constructed well!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice buffet
customer_reviews.text: Really like my buffet. It wasn’t too bad to assemble and looks really nice. As other reviewers have mentioned, there is a little bit of a smell (maybe from the stain), but it’s not too bad and went away after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Krauss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and good quality. I liked. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joann@Rameen Alkaba

customer_reviews.title: It is still good to use
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller then I expected. It is still good to use.
customer_reviews.author: benita mata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new buffet table. It’s sturdy and real wood. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful! Besides the smell.. the piece looks stunning! Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mohzai

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy. Looks nice. Middle drawer was not cut properly so it cant close completely but not really noticable
customer_reviews.author: latoya john-charles

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it for the price it is good quality. It is beautiful as well as sturdy. It fits in my dining room space perfectly. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE SHAW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but toxic
customer_reviews.text: This piece is just as pictured and has made a great addition to our home. However, the smell really is as bad as everyone says. It took about a week to become bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to build and it looks really nice. For this price it is a good cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jutta

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Looked very cheap in quality. Gave it away because of the look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: George H

customer_reviews.title: I love at
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and it comes after couple days, very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its served its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was a little shorter than I expected but storage is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Bax

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It just what I wanted it for, it beautiful . It does smell at first,
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Compliments my dining room nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture for the price. It's just what I was looking for. Believe the reviews about the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lavern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new shelf. Just beautiful.. Thank you again for your service
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass
customer_reviews.text: The item is very nice but the glass was broken when we received it. Don't want to go through the hassle of trying to return it since we already put it together.
customer_reviews.author: snabi

product_meta.title: Kings Brand Rutheron Buffet Server Cabinet / Console Table, Mirrored Doors, Espresso
feature_bullets: Kings Brand Furniture Rutheron Espresso Finish Wood, Mirrored Doors Buffet Server Cabinet / Console Table.
Transform the look of your dining area with the subtle transitional style, this sideboard will be a statement piece in your kitchen or dining area.
The mirrored glass doors are highlighted by the lattice woodwork on the door fronts.
Open the doors to reveal four spacious storage compartments with adjustable shelving to accommodate your storage requirements.
Dimensions: 43"W x 13"D x 31"H. Simple assembly required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
